After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.KPIS: Number of vehicles customized per month.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.EXPLANATION: Total count of vehicles customized by the company each month, indicating the volume of customization activities.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.FORMULA: Total Number of Vehicles Customized / Number of Months

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.EXPLANATION: Percentage of vehicle customizations completed accurately according to customer specifications and requirements.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Customizations / Total Number of Customizations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.EXPLANATION: Satisfaction level of customers with the quality and outcome of their vehicle customization, measured through surveys or feedback.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Vehicle Customization

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.EXPLANATION: Average time required to complete a vehicle customization from the initial order to final delivery, reflecting the efficiency of the customization process.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.FORMULA: Average Time from Customization Order to Completion

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each vehicle customization, including materials, labor, and overhead expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.FORMULA: Total Cost of Vehicle Customizations / Total Number of Vehicles Customized

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) from vehicle customization.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from vehicle customization activities compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Customizations / Total Cost of Customizations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.EXPLANATION: Rate at which new and innovative customization options are developed and offered to customers.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.FORMULA: (Number of New Customization Methods Introduced / Total Number of Customizations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.EXPLANATION: Degree to which vehicle customizations adhere to industry regulations and standards, measured through compliance checks and audits.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Cu.FORMULA: (Number of Customizations Complying with Regulations / Total Number of Customizations) * 100
